amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow the Secretary of the Interior to issue regulations to reduce methane emissions from oil and gas drilling operations on public lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 230 (Roll no. 601).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 230 (Roll no. 601).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Holt.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
